name: stale
description: Feedback from one or more authors is required to proceed.

name: blocking
description: Blocks milestones or other issues or pulls.

name: contribution
description: This contribution is considered for being merged.

name: good first issue
description: A good issue to tackle when being a novice to the project.

name: pending reply
description: Awaiting reply of author or contributor. Issue will be closed on inactivity.
